# init(placemark:)

**Initializer**

Creates and returns a map item object using the specified placemark object.

## Declaration

```swift
init(placemark: MKPlacemark)
```

## Parameters

- **placemark**: The placemark object corresponding to the desired map location. This parameter can’t be `nil`.

## Return Value

An initialized map item object.

## Discussion

Use this method to create a map item for an existing placemark. Don’t use it to create a map item representing the user’s location. To do that, use the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapItem/forCurrentLocation()] method instead.

## Creating map items

- **forCurrentLocation()**: Creates and returns a singleton map item object representing the user’s location.
